__e: What happened before he went to jail, what he thought you could've done for him and didn't.
I saw you come in and I asked for you because I thought maybe you might be able to help me through this.
In truth, I believe there's nothing either you or anyone could have said to change the old man's mind.
God, you had to see this girl's ass, it was perfect.
Yeah, should've seen the house I was in today.
You should have seen the state he was in when we found him.
As John and you two should have been.
You should have been nicer to dear Miss Singleton. Or maybe you were.
My father and his father before him were both Men of Letters, as John and you two should have been.
You should have seen the state he was in when we found him.
And did you talk about what you should do, now that he was here, in your house?
You shouldn't have done anything without me!
I told everyone down there that you weren't gonna hurt us.
I told someone about you and I thought you guys might make a good match.
I know you told me you would let me know if you needed anything, but
- Damn right I am! I wanted to go to the party, and I knew you'd say no.
He said I should speak to you and you'd tell me more.
Yes, I was afraid you'd say something like that.
Then you would own me, and I wouldn't get the land that I promised my people.
That he would come to you when you needed him the most.
Although, I knew that you didn't need my help one bit.
You should never have come here!
You should never have had a place among us!
You were never supposed to find out. I screwed up and got caught.
You wouldn't even know about her if I hadn't said anything.
If I'd told you the truth... you wouldn't have done what I asked.
